titles.title: Pilot Butte Power Plant Conveyance Act
Pilot Butte Power Plant Conveyance Act
Pilot Butte Power Plant Conveyance Act
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the Midvale Irrigation District the Pilot Butte Power Plant in the State of Wyoming, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 118-287.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Manchin with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 118-165.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 356.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Pilot Butte Power Plant Conveyance Act
This bill directs the Bureau of Reclamation to negotiate with the Midvale Irrigation District in Wyoming to enter into an agreement to convey the Pilot Butte Power Plant and its facilities from Reclamation to the irrigation district.
